description:
The nova repo contains links to the ocata config-reference like:

https://docs.openstack.org/ocata/config-reference/compute/hypervisors.html

For pike, the config-reference has moved to the project repos as part of the large reorg. All these links should be changed to the new location.
title: outdated URLs in docs

comments.content:
The nova repo contains links to the ocata config-reference like:

https://docs.openstack.org/ocata/config-reference/compute/hypervisors.html
